TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Guys, Oleg lost Gilgamesh's auto; let's make Oleg regret.

Euphkduu

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-02T05:53:40Z" title="03/02/2015 05:53  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 2, 2015</time> by Newt**
  
Forgot, umm, the --random letter-- part.

Elephants -- utilizing pretty hats -- kindly demolish underwater universes. 

askymzq

Asking Sentient Kerbals how Yummy My Zultron-Q chainsaw is.

mqigmqfd

Maybe quad-core Intel gramophones might quit functioning destructively.

Darn nutcases! Get going! It's too gosh-darn necessary!

iodoi

Idiots overestimate donuts or intelligence.

hafaurat

Hippos ate five alligators using reasonably accurate timepieces. 

xxdosrj

Xenon xylophones do or sit repeating jelly.

Waht did I just say. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

YUAASTKL

You underperform at all State taco killing lenders!

Facile ungulates moaned jarringly.

gigctenw

(Note, I don't have a sister. It just fit the letters!)

Many sheep intentionally trample roses. Ninja'd!

Heavy vehicles wait patiently, producing iodine.

(Since when were numbers allowed? o\_o)
